channel.title: Is this dedicated server sound good?
channel.description:
the dedicated server im thinking about buying has the following: Windows 2002/2003 or Linux (Red Hat, FreeBSD) web servers: ¤ AMD Athlon 2000+, 256 MB SDRAM, 40 Gigs Hard Drive, ¤ 200 GB Monthly Traffic (non Cogent), 100 Mbps Connection, ¤ FREE Webmin Control Panel (Plesk 7, Ensim or cPanel for the additional fee), full root access to the server.
is that good for hosting a server? also i dont kno if i posted in right forum section so DO NOT FLAME ME IF IT IS just answer the question.
